columns.Vehicle_ID: The unique identifier for each vehicle in the table.
columns.Model: The designation or name of the vehicle model.
columns.Build_Year: The year when the vehicle was manufactured.
columns.Top_Speed: The maximum speed achieved by the vehicle.
columns.Power: The engine power of the vehicle measured in horsepower.
columns.Builder: The name of the manufacturer or builder of the vehicle.
columns.Total_Production: The total number of units produced for the vehicle model.

vehicle.table_description: The table provides details about various vehicle models and specifications.

columns.Driver_ID: The unique identifier for each driver in the table.
columns.Name: The full name of the driver.
columns.Citizenship: The country of citizenship for the driver.
columns.Racing_Series: The name of the racing series the driver participates in.

driver.table_description: The table provides information about drivers and their racing affiliations.

columns.Driver_ID: The unique identifier for each driver associated with a vehicle.
columns.Vehicle_ID: The unique identifier for each vehicle associated with a driver.

vehicle_driver.table_description: The table links drivers to their corresponding vehicles in the database.
